tasmax.comment: maximum from all integrated time steps per day

tasmin.comment: minimum from all integrated time steps per day

tsl.comment: Temperature of each soil layer (3D variable). Reported as missing for grid cells with no land.

prhmax.comment: Defined as maximum of the precipitation rate averaged over the whole hour.

sfcWindmax.comment: Maximum from all integrated time steps per day

sund.comment: The WMO definition of sunshine is that the surface incident radiative flux from the solar beam (i.e. excluding diffuse skylight) exceeds 120 W m-2. "Duration" is the length of time for which a condition holds.

mrfso.comment: The mass of frozen water per unit area, summed over all soil layers. Reported as missing for grid cells with no land.

mrfsos.long_name: Frozen Water Content in Upper Portion of Soil Column
mrfsos.comment: The mass of frosen water  in the upper 10cm of the soil layer. Reported as missing for grid cells with no land. (not in CMIP)

mrfsol.long_name: Frozen Water Content of Soil Layer
mrfsol.comment: The mass of frosen water in each soil layer (3D variable). Reported as missing for grid cells with no land. (not in CMIP)

mrso.comment: The mass of water in all phases per unit area, summed over all soil layers.

mrsos.long_name: Moisture in Upper Portion of Soil Column
mrsos.comment: The mass of water in all phases in the upper 10cm of the soil layer. Reported as missing for grid cells with no land.

mrsol.long_name: Total Water Content of Soil Layer
mrsol.comment: The mass of water in all phases in each soil layer (3D variable). Reported as missing for grid cells with no land.

wsgsmax.long_name: Daily Maximum Near-Surface Wind Speed of Gust

CAPEmax.long_name: Daily Maximum Convective Available Potential Energy
